snippet: Lionel Messi scored his 87th and 88th goals of the year to give Barcelona a 2-0 win at the second-tier club Cordoba in the first leg of the Round of 16 in the Copa del Rey.
abstract: Barcelona defeats Cordoba, 2-0, in first leg of Round of 16 in Spain's Copa del Rey.
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi scored his 87th and 88th goals of the year to give Barcelona a 2-0 win at the second-tier club Cordoba in the first leg of the Round of 16 in the Copa del Rey.

headline.main: Messi Scores 2 More in Barcelona’s Win
